tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_donor_commitment_date AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, fd.transaction_date, f.amp_donor_org_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_funding_detail fd ON fd.amp_funding_id = f.amp_funding_id WHERE ((fd.transaction_type = 0) AND (f.source_role_id = (SELECT amp_role_id FROM amp_role WHERE role_code = 'DN')));
